heif.boxes

Class ItemReferenceBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.ItemReferenceBox

  • public class ItemReferenceBox
extends FullBox
    Represents the iref (Item Reference Box) in HEIF/ISOBMFF files.

    The Item Reference Box allows one item to reference other items using typed references. Each set of references for a specific type is stored in a SingleItemTypeReferenceBox. This structure enables relationships between media items, such as thumbnails, auxiliary images, or alternate representations.

    Specification Reference: ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015, Section 8.11.12 (Page 87).

    API Note: Additional testing is required to validate the reliability and robustness of this implementation.

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemReferenceBox

        public ItemReferenceBox(Box box,
                        SequentialByteReader reader)
        Constructs an ItemReferenceBox, reading its references from the specified SequentialByteReader resource.
        Parameters:
        box - the parent Box containing size and type information
        reader - the reader for sequential byte parsing
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if malformed data is encountered, such as a negative box size and corrupted data

    • Method Detail

      • getReferences

        public java.util.List<Box> getReferences()
        Returns the list of SingleItemTypeReferenceBox entries contained in this ItemReferenceBox resource.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of references

      • getBoxList

        public java.util.List<Box> getBoxList()
        Returns the list of child boxes.
        Overrides:
        getBoxList in class Box
        Returns:
        the list of reference boxes, or an empty list if none exist

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs a single diagnostic line for this box at the debug level.

        This is useful when traversing the box tree of a HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure for debugging or inspection purposes.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class FullBox
